sentence.Network_en: Objective : To reveal the anatomic relationship between hypoglossal and lingual nerve.
sentence.Network_cn: 〔摘要〕目的: 揭示猕猴舌下与舌神经间的关系,为临床开展新的术式提供依据.

sentence.Network_en: Neanderthal skulls also show evidence of a large hypoglossal canal.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼安得特人头盖骨也证明了存在大量的舌下神经管.

sentence.Network_en: The labelled fibers were found in the tracheosyringealis hypoglossal nerve.
sentence.Network_cn: 在舌下神经气管鸣管支有标记纤维.

list.abs: 舌下神经管岩部耳蜗导水管显示清晰，为三角形向内下开放的裂隙，在斜坡的外下方有一三角形的裂隙出现，为舌下神经管（hypoglossal canal）。茎突后缘模糊显示。-
